mapper.sql: breakdown_id, serial_number, breakdown_code, breakdown_desc, maintainer, maintain_date, status, dealwith_mode, wind_id, company, dealwith_team, dealwith_person, fill_person, position_id, position_desc, crew_id, equipment_id, equipment_desc, vane_speed, blade_torque_1, blade_torque_2, blade_torque_3, active_time, recover_time, downtime_windspeed, recover_windspeed, interrupt_time, electricity_loss, grid_connected_recover_time, breakdown_location, breakdown_attribute, maximum_load, system_busbar_110, system_busbar_35, system_busbar_400, workorder_number, workorder_desc, workorder_type, workorder_status, picture, phenomenon, remark

a.breakdown_id as breakdown_id,a.serial_number as serial_number,a.breakdown_code as breakdown_code,a.breakdown_desc as breakdown_desc, a.maintainer as maintainer,a.maintain_date as maintain_date,a.status as status,a.dealwith_mode as dealwith_mode,a.wind_id as wind_id, a.company as company, a.dealwith_team as dealwith_team,a.dealwith_person as dealwith_person,a.fill_person as fill_person, a.position_id as position_id,a.position_desc as position_desc,a.crew_id as crew_id,a.equipment_id as equipment_id, a.equipment_desc as equipment_desc,a.vane_speed as vane_speed,a.blade_torque_1 as blade_torque_1, a.blade_torque_2 as blade_torque_2,a.blade_torque_3 as blade_torque_3,a.active_time as active_time,a.recover_time as recover_time, a.downtime_windspeed as downtime_windspeed,a.recover_windspeed as recover_windspeed,a.interrupt_time as interrupt_time, a.electricity_loss as electricity_loss,a.grid_connected_recover_time as grid_connected_recover_time,a.breakdown_location as breakdown_location, a.breakdown_attribute as breakdown_attribute,a.maximum_load as maximum_load,a.system_busbar_110 as system_busbar_110, a.system_busbar_35 as system_busbar_35,a.system_busbar_400 as system_busbar_400,a.remark as remark,a.workorder_number as workorder_number, a.workorder_desc as workorder_desc,a.workorder_type as workorder_type,a.workorder_status as workorder_status,a.picture as picture, a.phenomenon as phenomenon, b.architecture_name as wind_name,d.crew_name as crew_name,e.position_name as position_name,f.equipment_name as equipment_name, g.title as breakdown_location_title,h.title as breakdown_attribute_title,i.title as dealwith_mode_title
mapper.select:
select
from breakdown_info a left join org_architecture b on a.wind_id = b.architecture_id and architecture_type = '02' left join crew_information d on a.crew_id = d.crew_id left join position_encode e on a.position_id = e.position_id left join equipment_asset_ledger f on a.equipment_id = f.equipment_id left join sp_code g on a.breakdown_location =g.id left join sp_code h on a.breakdown_attribute =h.id left join sp_code i on a.dealwith_mode =i.id where a.status != '0' and a.breakdown_id = #{breakdownId}

select
distinct
from breakdown_info
order by ${orderByClause}

update breakdown_info
serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
breakdown_code = #{breakdownCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
breakdown_desc = #{breakdownDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintainer = #{maintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
maintain_date = #{maintainDate,jdbcType=DATE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealwith_mode = #{dealwithMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wind_id = #{windId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealwith_team = #{dealwithTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealwith_person = #{dealwithPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

position_desc = #{positionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

equipment_desc = #{equipmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

blade_torque_2 = #{bladeTorque2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

recover_windspeed = #{recoverWindspeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

breakdown_location = #{breakdownLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
breakdown_attribute = #{breakdownAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update breakdown_info set serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, breakdown_code = #{breakdownCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, breakdown_desc = #{breakdownDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintainer = #{maintainer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maintain_date = #{maintainDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealwith_mode = #{dealwithMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wind_id = #{windId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealwith_team = #{dealwithTeam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealwith_person = #{dealwithPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fill_person = #{fillPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_desc = #{positionDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crew_id = #{crewId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, equipment_desc = #{equipmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vane_speed = #{vaneSpeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blade_torque_1 = #{bladeTorque1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blade_torque_2 = #{bladeTorque2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blade_torque_3 = #{bladeTorque3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, active_time = #{activeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, recover_time = #{recoverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, downtime_windspeed = #{downtimeWindspeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recover_windspeed = #{recoverWindspeed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, interrupt_time = #{interruptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, electricity_loss = #{electricityLoss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grid_connected_recover_time = #{gridConnectedRecoverTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, breakdown_location = #{breakdownLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, breakdown_attribute = #{breakdownAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maximum_load = #{maximumLoad,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_busbar_110 = #{systemBusbar110,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_busbar_35 = #{systemBusbar35,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, system_busbar_400 = #{systemBusbar400,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_number = #{workorderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_desc = #{workorderDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_type = #{workorderType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workorder_status = #{workorderStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phenomenon = #{phenomenon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where breakdown_id = #{breakdownId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT CASE WHEN h.wind_id IS NOT NULL then h.wind_id else "合计" end wind_id, SUM(A) A, SUM(B) B, SUM(C) C, SUM(D) D, SUM(E) E, SUM(F) F,f.wind_name from (SELECT i.wind_id, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1001 THEN breakdown_code END ) as A, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1002 THEN breakdown_code END ) as B, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1003 THEN breakdown_code END ) as C, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1004 THEN breakdown_code END ) as D, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1005 THEN breakdown_code END ) as E, count( CASE WHEN i.breakdown_code =1006 THEN breakdown_code END ) as F FROM breakdown_info i LEFT JOIN breakdown_attribute a ON i.breakdown_attribute = a.attribute_id
and i.active_time between #{activeTime} and #{activeTime2}
group by i.wind_id) h
LEFT JOIN wind_field f ON f.wind_id = h.wind_id
GROUP by h.wind_id with rollup
